posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Buchner Gold Coin Lot of 2 Bushong & Cahill SOLD For Both!
posts.post_content:
2 very nice cards-Cahill may be the inspiration for "Casey At The Bat". SOLD delivered for both PayPal friends/family please. Only selling as a 2 card lot. Thanks for having a look at my sale.

Joe K
